message:
is it legal for individuals to scan/crawl/collect or even ping in Egypt  ?

Robert Graham  - the first security researcher to try to scan the internet to determine how much impact the #shellshock have - faced some legal acquisitions about his scan and have an interesting post about it 

http://blog.erratasec.com/2014/09/do-shellshock-scans-violate-cfaa.html
